author: dreiss
msg: Add thrift_server:stop/1 to stop a running server

author: cdouglas
msg: HADOOP-3442. Limit recursion depth on the stack for QuickSort to prevent
StackOverflowErrors. To avoid O(n*n) cases, when partitioning depth exceeds a
multiple of log(n), change to HeapSort.

msg: HADOOP-3528. Metrics FilesCreated and files_deleted metrics do not match. (Lohit via Mahadev)
